bmds.description: Collection of "solvable" detective stories from the Birth of the Modern Detective Story (BMDS) dataset (https://github.com/ahmmnd/BMDS)

detectiveqa.description: Subset of the DetectiveQA dataset of full-length detective novels (https://github.com/Phospheneser/DetectiveQA)

squality.description: All sci-fi stories from the SQuALITY dataset (https://huggingface.co/datasets/pszemraj/SQuALITY-v1.3/)

booookscore.description: All books from the BooookScore dataset (https://github.com/lilakk/BooookScore)
